monography.name: Monography
monography.role: I am currently building their photobooth software while leading a team of developers and designers.
monography.stack: Technologies: Node.js, Electron.js, JavaScript, TypeScript, Firebase Cloud Storage

cozii.name: Cozii Proptech
cozii.role: I designed userflows, sitemaps, wireframes, and developed three WordPress websites under Cozii Proptech. I worked closely with designers and stakeholders during the SDLC's of each website. I worked within the WordPress CMS, with PHP, MySQL, and JavaScript.

son_of_rand.name: Son of Rand
son_of_rand.role: Helped the Son Of Rand development team with creative development. I was tasked with adding interactivity to the home page by adding navigations items that were draggable objects. I worked with shopify.liquid and JavaScript for this project.
son_of_rand.stack: Technologies: JavaScript, Shopify Liquid template language, Matter.js, JQuery

band_of_devs.name: Band Of Dev's
band_of_devs.role: I have a team of developers and designers that help small to medium sized business jumpstart their digital presenece. We specialize in breaking through the outer bounds of front-end creativity when it comes to user interaction.
